body:
Hey everyone, as mentioned in multiple previous posts my Trailer was talked about a lot!
But now, it has been uploaded; The Nebula Series Trailer is officially on YouTube!
Please take a minute or two to click the link below and maybe subscribe to my channel. 
Here is the link:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ad0ID1R2iak
